/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering skyscrapers and modern buildings, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. The buildings are predominantly gray and white, punctuated by occasional blue and green accents, adding a touch of color to the urban landscape. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the concrete structures. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
